name: apple-music-mcp
description: Control Apple Music with Claude using AppleScript on macOS
long_description: This extension provides comprehensive control over Apple Music through Claude. You can play, pause, skip tracks, control volume, search for music, and manage playlists - all through natural conversation with Claude. The extension uses AppleScript to communicate directly with the Apple Music app on your Mac, giving you full control over your music library and streaming experience.

tools.name: apple_music_play_track
tools.description: Start playback of a specific track by name and artist

tools.name: apple_music_play_album
tools.description: Start playback of an album by name and artist

tools.name: apple_music_play_playlist
tools.description: Start playback of a playlist by name

tools.name: apple_music_get_current_track
tools.description: Get information about the currently playing track

tools.name: apple_music_get_player_state
tools.description: Get the current player state (playing, paused, stopped)

tools.name: apple_music_set_position
tools.description: Set the player position within the current track

tools.name: apple_music_get_position
tools.description: Get the player position within the current track

tools.name: apple_music_get_liked_status
tools.description: Get the liked status of the current track

tools.name: apple_music_search_and_play
tools.description: Search for a track and play it
